Question
========

These days, adult television viewers seem increasingly reluctant to to watch informative programs. Adult television viewers can be divided into three age categories: 18-35 (48%), 36-60 (35%) and 61 and older (17%). Of the television viewers in the age group 18-35, 48% watch at least 5x a week of informative programs. For TV viewers in the age categories 36-60 and 61 and older, the percentages who watch informative programs watch 51% and 58%, respectively._____________________________. What percentage of viewers who watch at least 5x a week of watch informational programming fall into the 36-60 age group?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,167
* 0,352
* 0,380
* 0,452

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.167: Incorrect
* 0.352: Correct
* 0.380: Incorrect
* 0.452: Incorrect
